WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Fixed in SVN

Note to users:
----
mbstring extension must be enabled. Check with phpinfo() if you are unsure whether it is enabled. If not enabled, you will still get broken number format codes whenever you use non-ASCII characters.
WorkItem.Description:
Inherited bug from the PEAR Spreadsheet_Excel_Writer, reported in PEAR Bugs #9062, and #14738
http://pear.php.net/bugs/bug.php?id=9062
http://pear.php.net/bugs/bug.php?id=14738
 
Reported for this project:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=30685
 
In particular, this issue affects those wanting to use currency symbols within the number format code that are outside the ASCII range such as the euro symbol: €
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel: Latest source from SVN (1.6.3+)
WorkItem.Summary: Missing UTF-8 support in number format codes for PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5
